name: Wings Intellect
overview:
Interactions, Conversation and Engagements can reshape how we work, learn and function. Wings is creating tools and processes to drive this new way of life.

Wings Intellect creates virtual and augmented reality softwares (primarily games) for diverse applications. With a special domain expertise in learning and training, Wings uses a trademark ICE framework for communication and pedagogy design.

Founded by 3 enthusiastic gamers, Wings believes that interactions, conversations and engagements can be used to shape most of our business and personal processes.

Building games with a purpose and drawing true value out of all forms of media is the broad business objective, and Wings is poised to be an industry leader.
